utterance: You can use this card to interpret your yes or no questions or to shed light on any situation you have in mind. Think about a question or a specific situation.
Take your deck and shuffle it.
Take out a card and place it in front of you
Think about a situation in your life that you would like clarity on.
Take out the second card and place it to the left
Take out the last card and place it to the right
Think about your current situation first
Think about your current situation first
Take out a card and place it in the middle. This card symbolizes the present state or the issue at hand.
Take out the second card and place it to the left. This represents your perspective.
The fourth card should be placed below the central cads. This represents the foundation of the relationship or something in the past contributing to the current issue.
The final card should be placed above the central card and represents the likely outcome.
Take out a card and place it in the bottom of a cross. This card symbolizes what you see in others that you can't see in yourself.
The second card should be to the left of the center of a cross. This symbolizes the source of your projection.
The third card should be in the center. This represents what part of the projection you can reclaim.
Place the fourth card to the right of the center. This tells you the feelings that you might experience when you release this pattern.
Your final card should be at the top of the cross. This represents what you could gain by reclaiming this projection.
